pages.text: Without a doubt, sending down the book is from the Master of Human kind
Or do they say he made it up? No, but it is the truth from your Master in order for you to warn people whom a warner did not come to them before you, so that they may be guided

God is the One who created the skies and the earth and whatever between them in six stages then He settled on the throne. There is no protector and no mediator for you other than Him. Do you not take notice
He directs the affair from the sky to the earth then it goes up to Him in a day that its duration is one thousand years of what you count
This is knower of the unseen and the visible, the powerful, the merciful
The One who created everything well, and He began the creation of the human being from clay
Then He made his descendants from an extract of a despicable (and slimy) liquid
Then He shaped him and He blew from His breath/spirit into him, and He made you the hearing, the sight, and the heart. You give little thanks
And they said: when we disappear in the earth, will we be in a new creation? No, but they are disbelievers in meeting of their Master
Say: the angel of death, the one who is put in charge of you, makes you die, then you are returned to your Master
